label: Starter
description: A simple Airflow data pipeline with SQL task dependencies.

label: Standard
description: A more complex Airflow data pipeline with SQL task dependencies and Jinja templating.

label: Advanced
description: An advanced Airflow pipeline with industry-standard software engineering best practices bundled with latest developer tooling, git hooks, and minimal CI/CD setup. Includes additional Airflow operator examples, external APIs, XCOMs, BigQuery Jobs, Jinja templating, and more.

label: Barebones
description: Minimal scaffold. Just the directory structure and empty config files.
